name: Friday Night Funkin, but BF has red hair
name_original: Friday Night Funkin, but BF has red hair
description:
This is basically Friday Night Funkin, but I gave boyfriend red hair, and I put my voice on the countdown. 

Controls: 

Swipe Up and down to move through the menu list, tap to select.

Swipe right to change the difficulty.

Tap the arrows on screen to use them

Swipe left <—— to go back to the previous menu (won’t pause, you can only go back to the previous menu during gameplay if you died.)

————————————————————————————————————————————-

Please  note that this is my first mod to Friday Night Funkin, I made the hair on pixilr on my phone so please bear with me, also, this mod is not in its final version yet, I’m still making updates to the skins, but please do enjoy my first mod :)

- TG20
